languages.text: "Ты винишь Теодору, но ведь это ты допустил, что обряд привел к катастрофе".

traits.locale_text: "Ты продолжаешь винить Теодору, но это твоей задачей было озаботиться безопасностью ритуала".

languages.text: "You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."
languages.original_text: "Ты винишь Теодору, но ведь это ты допустил, что обряд привел к катастрофе".

traits.locale_text: "You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."
"You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."
"You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."
"You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."
"You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."
"You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."

languages.text: «Culpa a Theodora, pero el ritual acabó en tragedia bajo su supervisión».
languages.original_text: "You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."

traits.locale_text: «Culpa a Theodora, pero el ritual acabó en tragedia bajo su supervisión».

languages.text: 「シオドーラを悪く言うが、君の監視の下、儀式は悲劇に向かったのだろう」
languages.original_text: "You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラを悪く言うが、君の監視の下、儀式は悲劇に向かったのだろう」

languages.text: “你认为这一切都是西奥多拉的错，但事故是在你的监督下发生的。”
languages.original_text: "You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."

traits.locale_text: “你认为这一切都是西奥多拉的错，但事故是在你的监督下发生的。”

languages.text: "Ihr gebt Theodora die Schuld, doch Ihr wart für das Ritual verantwortlich, das zur Katastrophe geführt hat."
languages.original_text: "You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr gebt Theodora die Schuld, doch Ihr wart für das Ritual verantwortlich, das zur Katastrophe geführt hat."

languages.text: « Vous accusez Théodora, mais c'est sous votre houlette que le rituel a tourné à la catastrophe. »
languages.original_text: "You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."

traits.locale_text: « Vous accusez Théodora, mais c'est sous votre houlette que le rituel a tourné à la catastrophe. »

languages.text: "Theodora'yı suçluyorsun ama ayin, senin gözetimin altında felakete dönüşmüş."
languages.original_text: "You blame Theodora, but it was on your watch that the ritual led to a disaster."
